name: In My Head (kartherine)
description:
A very short walking simulator about anxiety and working from home.  Use WASD  to walk and mouse to look around. Force quit to exit (sorry).

Credits
=======

Brain model by cgcreation: https://www.turbosquid.com/FullPreview/Index.cfm/ID/833681

Original synth choir soundtrack by Matthew Slayton: http://www.matthewslayton.com/

Skybox by Stagit East: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/earth-planets-sk...

"World coming to end" texture: Flash Gordon comic strip (1934),  by Alex Raymond, (c) King Features Syndicate. As the historic first panel of the comic book, representing the end of the world, it is fair use in this artwork about apocalyptic sentiments.

Head Augustus model by Cone of Vision: https://www.turbosquid.com/FullPreview/Index.cfm/ID/1327693 


Marble texture and animated face assets by Katherine Buse: http://www.katherinebuse.com
